DOC.brief_summary: This multicenter , randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled , Phase 2 study evaluate efficacy intravenous RO7046015 versus placebo 52 week participant early Parkinson 's Disease ( PD ) untreated treated monoamine oxidase B ( MAO-B ) inhibitor since baseline . The study consist 2 part : 52-week , double-blind , placebo-controlled treatment period ( Part 1 ) eligible participant continue all-participants-on-treatment blind dose extension additional 52 week ( Part 2 ) .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Efficacy RO7046015 Participants With Early Parkinson 's Disease
